groups.label: WindowInfo_Contents_Config_Delete
groups.text:
This will delete all Flipnotes and
folders created with this software.

(This may take a long time.)

groups.label: WindowInfo_Contents_Config_PenBox
groups.text:
Select the normal or the advanced
tool set for creating Flipnotes.

With the advanced tools, you can
use up to three layers.

groups.label: WindowInfo_Contents_Config_Hand
groups.text:
Controls for creating Flipnotes will be
mapped differently depending on which
hand you use the stylus with.

Please select your stylus hand.

groups.label: WindowConfirm_Config_Sample
groups.text:
Copy sample Flipnotes
to the SD card?

groups.label: WindowInfo_Contents_Config_Sample
groups.text:
Copy sample Flipnotes
to the Home folder.

Copying will fail if there is not enough
free space on the SD card.

groups.label: WindowConfirm_Config_AllDelete_Confirm
groups.text:
Are you sure you want to
delete all your Flipnotes
and folders?

Once this data is deleted,
it cannot be recovered.

groups.label: WindowInfo_Contents_Config_Creator
groups.text:
Change your user name.

Your user name is displayed in
the detailed information about your
Flipnotes, among other places.

groups.label: WindowInfo_Contents_Config_Se
groups.text:
Choose whether or not to have
sound effects when drawing,
touching icons and so on.

groups.label: WindowConfirm_Config_AllDelete
groups.text:
Do you want to delete
Flipnotes and folders?

groups.label: WindowInfo_Contents_Config_Frog
groups.text:
Choose whether or not to
display the frog icon on the
bottom-left of the Touch Screen
while creating Flipnotes.

groups.label: WindowWait_Config_SampleCopy_End
groups.text:
Sample Flipnotes have been
copied to the Home folder.
